game.name: Basketball Scorer
game.description:
In one of the most amazing online basketball soccer game, there are many ways that you successfully carryout the game to the next extraordinary level of playing. However, in the category of free basket ball games, you can choose in the basket ball soccer from three modes, Still, Random and Moving. In any of the game mode being as a player you have to click the mouse and pull its strength and release the button.

Still mode is that where the basket remain still and don?t move up or down, whereas in the random mode, the basket move only when the ball is about to enter into the basket. In the moving mode, the ball keeps on moving unless the movement of the game keeps on happening and occurring.

The basketball soccer game to a greater extent is time centric, where, time limit is too important and of a greater extent. For throwing a basket, there are total 60 seconds to play and for each of the basket, you get around 200 points. When the ball reaches into the basket from the wrong side, there, is an option that you lose up around 5 seconds. Playing with mouse let you to better up the speed to maintain the speed.
